meanings.definition: Tubes that carry urine from the kidneys to the bladder.
meanings.sent1: The ureters transport urine from the kidneys to the bladder.
meanings.sent2: Doctors explained that the ureters are like tiny tubes connecting the kidneys and the bladder.
meanings.sent3: The ureters decided to take a detour on their way to the bladder, causing a delay in the bathroom trip.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as strong as the ureters carrying urine swiftly to the bladder.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ureters diligently moving urine to the bladder stayed in his mind.
